remarks: Universal property of the free monoid by existential uniqueness. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2016.)
statement:
frgpup3.g $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
frgpup3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
frgpup3.u $e |- U = ( varFGrp ` I ) $.
frgpup3 $p |- ( ( H e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ F : I --> B ) -> E! m e. ( G GrpHom H ) ( m o. U ) = F ) $.
$d B m $.
$d F m $.
$d G m $.
$d H m $.
$d I m $.
$d U m $.
$d V m $.
